data.question: Question here...
data.text:
For this test to pass you should see the a TEI Annotation tool bar abov this text area with icons for:

Bold(B), Table Cell, Date, GeoLocation, Glossary, Head, Hyperlink, Italic, Item, LineBreak(lb), List, PageBreak(pb), Paragraph, Person, RemoveEntity, Row, Strikethrough, Table, Underline
